title: i am actually so sick
body:
of all these DJ Sona players. 
Having an expensive skin does not make you good.

replies.body: But having an expensive skin does allow the beat to be dropped.

yet most people i have played with are realising that AP sona is lethal and are carrying games, you must just be unlucky

anyway its fair enough to let people play with their new toy
What do you expect from a skin we've been waiting to get for 2 months?
if you can't be good, at least look good.
My friend just bans Sona now in the pick and ban phase, haha. 420 swag uber cool yolo abcs {{item:3070}}
